info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 7:32PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Light to moderate snow to continue through this evening over portions of North Central and Central Montana... At 720 pm...Light snow has been decreasing from the northwest over the plains of North Central Montana, but areas of moderate snow will persist through at least 830 pm over the area east of Great Falls and south of Havre, which includes the Lewistown area. Additional accumulations in this moderate snow area will likely range from around one inch at lower elevations to between 1 and 3 inches in the mountains. Many roads are already snow covered and icy, so be careful out on the roads this evening if you have to travel.
